text: The Colgate Raiders represented Colgate University in ECAC women's ice hockey during the 2014–15 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season. ==Offseason== *Sept. 22: Lauren Wildfang was selected for the Team Canada Fall Festival in Calgary. ===Recruiting=== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#862633;color:white; font-size:smaller;" | Player || Position ||Nationality || Notes |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Shelby Perry || Forward || || Member of Team Ontario Blue |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Ellie DeCaprio || Forward || || Competed with the East Coast Wizards |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Kaila Pinkney || Defense || || Member of Team Ontario Red |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Megan Sullivan || Forward || || Member of Team Ontario Blue |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Lauren Wildfang || Defense || || Former member of Team Canada |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Breanne Wilson-Bennett || Forward || || Former member of Team Canada |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Annika Zalewski || Forward || || Played with the Buffalo Bison |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |} == Roster == ==Schedule== |- !colspan=12 style="background:#862633;color:white;"| Regular Season ==References== Colgate Category:Colgate Raiders women's ice hockey seasons
title: 2014–15 Colgate Raiders women's ice hockey season
